```{r generate_calendar, eval = FALSE, echo=FALSE}
## load library
library(toastui)

## data frame with dates & topics
cal_data<-read.csv("calendar_data.csv")

## display calendar
calendar(cal_demo_data(), navigation = TRUE, defaultDate = Sys.Date()) %>%
  cal_month_options(
    startDayOfWeek  = 1, 
    narrowWeekend = TRUE
  ) %>% 
  cal_props(cal_demo_props())
    
```
